name: Chris Cantu
profile_entries: 13 years work experience in Information Technology, 4 years of supervisory experience
Masters Degree in Information Systems / Bachelors Degree in Information Systems and International Business - Minor in Spanish
Proven effective supervisor, team lead, and mentor via the implementation of multiple successful project
Inspire creativity and encourage innovation in coworkers by maintaining open and productive working environment
acheivements: Lead a team of 10 junior developers to successfully deploy team’s first enterprise application on time and within budget
Nominated “Employee of the Year” at Baylor University in 2002. Received by only 5 % of employees
Lead software team in the complete design and development of a high traffic application on the http://irs.gov website.
Contributed to the EasyB project and recognized as a project member
Developed and presented a 1 hour Grails live coding demonstration for the San Antonio Java User Group with a colleague

jobs.title: Software Developer III
descriptions: Design, Develop, Test, Deploy, and Maintain Java, Groovy, Spring 2.5, J2EE, and Grails applications as a member of a team
Research, Prototype, Present, and Implement new technological solutions and methodologies for team and leadership
Integrate with various systems via Web Services (SOAP, XMLRPC & REST), Database Connections, and JMS Technologies
Meet with other internal teams to develop requirements, design integrated components, and troubleshoot issues
Mentor junior developers and facilitate on boarding of peer developers when joining the team or new project
Facilitate the improvement of corporate culture and communication as a member of the Inclusion and Innovation Team

jobs.title: Programmer Specialist
descriptions: Facilitated the planning of each of the project cycles by providing technical guidance and estimates for work
Lead the design, coding, enhancing, and testing of J2EE / Java / Spring 2.0 - 2.5 software to meet business requirements
Communicated with project managers team issues and barriers and facilitate their resolution
Coached and mentored junior developers with technical and professional issues

jobs.title: IT Associate Programmer-Analyst
descriptions: Designed and developed J2EE/Java based web applications and services requested by business in Websphere environment
Met with business users in order to define application requirements as part of the development process
Discussed new applications and procedures for departmental process improvements as a member of a committee
Created analysis and design documentation for future application development and maintenance

jobs.title: Technology Support Specialist
descriptions: Managed the daily operations of language computer lab including a staff of fifteen lab assistants
Developed, implemented, and administered PHP based web application, and streaming servers
Supported foreign language software for all campus staff and faculty
Provided professional and technical training to faculty, staff, and student body
Coordinated purchases and installation of computer and multimedia equipment upgrades

jobs.title: Consultant - SAP HR Information Analyst
descriptions: Facilitated the implementation of the SAP Human Resources module for international employees
Coordinated communication of business requirements between international and domestic partners
Provided support and training to international partners via email and telephone communications
Developed technical training documentation for implementation of new system
Performed testing of new client software and provided feedback to developers

jobs.title: Enron Transition Team Member
descriptions: Obtained SAP Accounts Payable training with Compaq USA and Compaq Canada clients
Facilitated the acquisition of client accounts payable department with customized SAP solution
Analyzed client accounts payable processes, identified potential issues, and recommended solutions
Interviewed client employees to identify issues not found in initial analysis and provide recommendations
Communicated with domestic and international clients via telephone, email, and personal contact

training_classes.title: No Fluff Just Stuff - Groovy / Grails / Spring Framework 4 day intensive seminar
No Fluff Just Stuff - Groovy / Grails / Spring Framework 4 day intensive seminar
SpringSource - Core Spring (Spring Framework 2.5) 4 day intensive training seminar

degrees.type: Masters of Science in Information Systems
